body:
Self explanatory title:
I've always been interested in people and what they're into, so I thought it would be cool to see what everyone's favourite songs were and what taste in music they have.
So. Feel free to list your 10 favourite songs (and who they're by) of all time or at the moment. No judging each other please.

I'll start:

1. Señor - Bob Dylan   <-- (So, song then artist)
2. Most of the Time - Bob Dylan
3. Beautiful - Eminem
4. Redemption Song - Bob Marley
etc.
etc. 

I look forward to seeing everyone's favourites :)

title: Your Top 10 Favourite Songs  :)

replies.body:
hahahah soooo, not much of an Abba fan?

I used to listen to Abba all the time, like several years ago, i remember listening to Waterloo, Honey Honey, Fernando, S.O.S and a handful of others :o :)

Avicii-Without You
Bryce - feat.J-Malik - Bodyrock-Dancecom Remix
Krewella - We are one (Dzeko & Torres remix)
Van Snyder vs. DDei&Estate - If i could be you.
JJD - Again
Otto Knows - Parachut (Fred Dax Remix)
Capital Kings - Fireblazin (Neon Feather remix)
Krewella - Enjoy The Ride (Nik K Remix)
Marimo - Nightcore - Evacuate the dance floor
Technikore - Hold It, Check It

Passing through with my electronic music.  Not really in to the many mainstream artists nowa days apart from DJ's such as Avicii , Calvin Harris etc
